lead_paragraph: HINCK--Joanna Marie "Joy," died on March 2, 2016. She was 49. Joy is survived by her father and stepmother, Henry and Pearl Hinck and by her sister and brother-in-law, Kate and Mike Khavari, and her nephew and niece, Ali and Sarah Khavari. 1/3
